description_html: Maya Romanoff introduces Cozy™, a brand new wallcovering and upholstery collection in collaboration with internationally renowned architect and designer, David Rockwell. The fourth Rockwell and Romanoff collaboration promises to be a timeless addition to classics Blanket™ and Stitched™. Cozy combines superior woven, heathered wool with metallic foil or three dimensional ink evocative of stitching. Five graphic patterns and a solid coordinate are offered in tonal, metallic, and high-contrast colorways, and take the collection from chic to playful. The plush construction absorbs sound and creates a quiet atmosphere worthy of its name. The collection features 34 design combinations including solid companions.
